targets.rawSql:
SELECT --DISTINCT ON (a.id) a.id::Text "CODIGO CASOS", 
      a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
      e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", 
      e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", 
			b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
			c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
			d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", 
			a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", 
			g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	    case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
			to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA",
      case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
      k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
           -- LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            where a.id_estatus in (3,4,8) 
            and j.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
            order by a.id desc;

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE CONATEL EN LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (7)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (7)
    and a.id_estatus in (5)

-- Casos Recibidos
 SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    and a.id_estatus in (15)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (7)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

--Total de Casos por Fecha
select to_char(a.fecha, 'mm-dd') as fecham, count(a.fecha) as total
    	from gestion.caso a
    		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
    	 	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	      where a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL)
	      and b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
		    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        group by fecham 
        order by fecham

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
  	where  d.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
	  and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
	 and a.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDOS
REPORTE GENERAL DE LOS CASOS DE CONATEL

targets.rawSql:
select count(a.id) as TOTAL
	from gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	  where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
		      and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

select count(*) as TOTAL
        from gestion.caso a
				inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
				        and a.id_extra_categoria is not null
				        and d.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

select count(*) as TOTAL
      from gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
      where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_extra_categoria is null
			and b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	     FROM gestion.caso a 
        inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria 
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
        left join gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
        where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
			  and b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
        GROUP BY sub_categoria
        ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT i.nombre as estatus, count(a.id) as subtotal,
            (SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
    					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
    					inner join gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
    			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
    					where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
    					and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404))::Text "Total"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
         where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
         group by estatus

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where a.id_estatus in (6)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
           inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria  
           inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
           inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
			     inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
           LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
           where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
			     and b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
           GROUP BY sub_categoria
           ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
           inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria 
           inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
           inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
				   inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
           LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
           where a.id_estatus in (6)
			     and b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
           GROUP BY sub_categoria
           ORDER BY total desc;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
  inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
  inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula --ACTIVAR CUANDO EL PERSONAL DE YSRAEL SUBAN ESA TABLA A LA ORGANIZACION Lista
	inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	where  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
	and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
  group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
    inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	  where  a.id_estatus in (6)
		and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
    group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL CASO DE CONATEL DE UBCH EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
      --a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO",
      e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
            case when w.username is null then 'Analizando' else (w.first_name || ' ' || w.last_name) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			w.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
            and j.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404);

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE CONATEL DE LA BASE DE DATOS (UBCH)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
    where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
    and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
    where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
    and a.id_estatus in (6)

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
     from gestion.caso a
  	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
  	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
  	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
  	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
  	 and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)
     group by estado
     order by total desc;

panels.title: CASOS EN PROCESO POR ENT. FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
   from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
	 and a.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DE CONATEL POR ENTIDADES FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
       	where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
			  and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
        group by b.nombre 
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS  DE UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
       	where a.id_estatus in (6)
			  and c.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
        group by b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS  ATENDIDOS DE  UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)
REPORTE DE CASOS DE CONATEL DE UBCH RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS (POR ENTIDADES  FEDERALES)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where a.id_estatus in (6) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	  and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		      	inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
        where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	      and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
       where a.id_estatus in (6)
       and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	     and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
       order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE CONATEL RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS POR MUNICIPIOS(CAPITALES DE ENTIDADES FEDERALES )

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	  and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where a.id_estatus in (6) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	  and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		      	inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
            and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	          and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
            group by c.nombre, b.nombre
            order by TOTAL desc

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_estatus in (6)
            and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
      	    and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
            group by c.nombre, b.nombre
            order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE CONATEL RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS DE OTROS MUNICIPIOS  (CIUDADES IMPORTANTES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
	  		    and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
            group by c.nombre, b.nombre
            order by TOTAL desc limit 50

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_estatus in (6)
	  		    and e.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
            group by c.nombre, b.nombre
            order by TOTAL desc limit 50

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS  POR ENTIDADES PARROQUIALES (50 PRIMERAS PARROQUIAS)
